channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- WebSphere Application Server ND
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- WebSphere Application Server ND

item.title: CVE-2021-20517|2024-09-17T02:36:50.637Z -- ibm -- websphere%20application%20server%20nd
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server Network Deployment 8.5 and 9.0 could allow a remote authenticated attacker to traverse directories. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) to read and delete arbitrary files on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 198435.
